alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 8:22PM CST until February 20 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Ottawa affecting La Salle County. For the Illinois River (Upper)...including Ottawa, elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Illinois River at Ottawa. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 461.0 feet, River Rescue boat dock inundated in Ottawa. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CST Friday the stage was 461.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below action stage Sunday morning. - Action stage is 461.0 feet. - Flood stage is 463.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: These forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well as forecast precipitation 48 hours into the future. Changes to the rainfall forecast, or any additional rainfall after 48 hours, may cause changes to these river forecasts. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/Chicago and water.weather.gov The next statement is expected Saturday morning.
